description: With excerpts from over fifty films from the horror genre, "Terror in the aisles" delivers a fast paced montage of some of the most terrifying scenes in cinema from the best of the horror genre. This collection is not for the faint-hearted but will satisfy the horror buff as some of the most classic scenes from the genre are revisited here. Some excerpts include: "The Exorcist", "Psycho", "Carrie", "Shining", "Rosemary's baby", "The Howling", "Eyes of Laura Mars", "Midnight express", "Halloween", "The Birds", "Suspiria", "Marathon man", "Jaws", "The Texas chainsaw massacre", "Poltergeist", "The Fog", "Scanners and many more. Narrated by Donald Pleasence and Nancy Allen.
